name: Through Time
storyline: In the future scientists have discovered that it is possible to travel back in time. They send a person to the past to do research but not everything goes well.
summary: Through Time is a single-player platform game in which you have to pass levels. The more levels you go, the more difficulty increases. Every month there is a new season with a new theme that is illustrated through the levels. You can unlock new characters and play with them, there are also temporary events in which you can unlock a lot of rewards.
